chapters.title: Chapter 14: Message from the M'Hael
chapters.info: Peral Torval, p. 295 (330)—Asha'man who comes with a message for Rand. He is close to his middle years, and has a sharp nose. He grew up in Tarabon. When he first met Rand, he tried to pick a fight with him, but was punished by Taim before he could cause any trouble.
